name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
description: The Apple iPhone 13 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple, featuring cutting-edge technology and powerful performance.
features: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with HDR10 and Dolby Vision
ProMotion technology with 120Hz refresh rate
Triple 12MP camera system with Ultra-Wide, Wide, and Telephoto lenses
Night mode, Deep Fusion, and Smart HDR 3 for stunning photos
A15 Bionic chip with 6-core CPU and 4-core GPU, delivering fast and efficient performance
Neural Engine for advanced machine learning tasks
iOS 15 with App Library, widgets, and App Clips
Ceramic Shield front cover for enhanced durability
5G capable for high-speed connectivity
Water and dust resistance (IP68)

specifications.display: 6.1 inches, Super Retina XDR, 2532 x 1170 pixels
specifications.processor: A15 Bionic chip with 6-core CPU and 4-core GPU
specifications.camera: Triple 12MP system with Ultra-Wide, Wide, and Telephoto lenses

name: Apple MacBook Air
description: The MacBook Air is a sleek and lightweight laptop, perfect for everyday computing tasks.
features: 13.3-inch Retina display with True Tone
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 7-core or 8-core GPU
Fanless design for silent operation
Magic Keyboard and Force Touch trackpad
Up to 16GB unified memory
Fast SSD storage
macOS Big Sur with a sleek and intuitive interface
Up to 18 hours of battery life
Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) ports

specifications.display: 13.3 inches, Retina display with True Tone
specifications.processor: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 7-core or 8-core GPU

name: Apple iPad Mini (3rd Generation)
description: The iPad Mini is a compact tablet with a powerful A12 Bionic chip, perfect for on-the-go productivity and entertainment.
features: 7.9-inch Retina display with True Tone
A12 Bionic chip with Neural Engine
Touch ID fingerprint sensor
8MP back camera and 7MP FaceTime HD front camera
Stereo speakers with wide stereo audio
Wi-Fi and Gigabit-class LTE
Up to 10 hours of battery life
iPadOS with support for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard

specifications.display: 7.9 inches, Retina display with True Tone
specifications.processor: A12 Bionic chip with Neural Engine
specifications.camera: 8MP back camera and 7MP FaceTime HD front camera

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: The AirPods Pro deliver immersive sound with active noise cancellation and a customizable fit for all-day comfort.
features: Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound
Transparency mode for hearing and connecting with the world around you
Customizable fit with three sizes of soft, tapered silicone tips
Adaptive EQ automatically tunes music to the shape of your ear
Sweat and water-resistant
H1 chip for easy setup and seamless switching between devices
Dual beamforming microphones for clear calls
Up to 4.5 hours of listening time on one charge (up to 24 hours with charging case)

specifications.sensors: Dual beamforming microphones, Dual optical sensors, Motion-detecting accelerometer, Force sensor
specifications.battery: More than 24 hours of listening time with multiple additional charges from the charging case

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: The Apple Watch Series 7 is the latest generation smartwatch with a larger and more durable display.
features: Always-on Retina display with 20% more screen area
50% thicker front crystal for improved durability
Advanced health sensors, including blood oxygen and ECG
Fast charging, 80% charge in 45 minutes
Water-resistant up to 50 meters
watchOS 8 with new fitness and mindfulness features
Interchangeable bands for personalized style

specifications.sensors: Blood oxygen sensor, ECG app, Electrical and optical heart sensors

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch is a powerful laptop designed for professionals, offering enhanced performance and a stunning display.
features: 16-inch Retina display with True Tone
Powerful Intel Core i9 processor
AMD Radeon Pro graphics
Up to 64GB of DDR4 memory
Up to 8TB SSD storage
Magic Keyboard with scissor mechanism
Six-speaker sound system with force-canceling woofers
Four Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) ports

specifications.display: 16 inches, Retina display with True Tone

name: Apple HomePod Mini
description: The HomePod Mini is a compact smart speaker that delivers impressive audio and integrates seamlessly with Apple's ecosystem.
features: Room-filling, 360-degree sound
Siri voice control for hands-free operation
HomeKit integration for smart home control
Intercom feature for communication between HomePods
Personalized listening recommendations
Privacy-focused design with on-device processing
Compatibility with Apple Music and other streaming services

specifications.audioTechnology: Full-range driver and dual passive radiators

name: Apple Magic Mouse 2
description: The Magic Mouse 2 is a sleek and wireless mouse with a multitouch surface for easy navigation and gestures.
features: Wireless connectivity via Bluetooth
Multi-Touch surface for gestures
Rechargeable battery with Lightning port
Optimized foot design for smooth movement
Seamless integration with macOS

name: Apple AirTag
description: The AirTag is a small and lightweight accessory that helps you keep track of your belongings using the Find My app.
features: Precision finding with Ultra-Wideband technology
Water and dust resistance (IP67)
Customizable engraving
Replaceable CR2032 battery
Integration with the Find My app
Privacy-focused design

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th Generation)
description: The iPad Pro 12.9-inch is a powerful tablet with a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and the M1 chip for high-performance computing.
features: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU
12MP Wide and 10MP Ultra-Wide rear cameras
TrueDepth camera for Face ID facial recognition
Thunderbolt and USB 4 support
Up to 16GB RAM for smooth multitasking
Magic Keyboard and Apple Pencil compatibility

specifications.display: 12.9 inches, Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology
specifications.processor: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU

name: Apple iMac 24-inch
description: The iMac 24-inch is a sleek and colorful all-in-one desktop computer powered by the M1 chip for efficient performance and vibrant visuals.
features: 24-inch 4.5K Retina display with P3 wide color and True Tone
Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU
Immersive audio with six-speaker sound system and spatial audio
Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports and two USB 3 ports
Magic Keyboard with Touch ID and Magic Mouse or Magic Trackpad
macOS Big Sur with a redesigned interface

specifications.display: 24 inches, 4.5K Retina display with P3 wide color and True Tone
specifications.processor: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU
specifications.ports: Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports, Two USB 3 ports

name: Apple Watch SE
description: The Apple Watch SE offers essential features of a smartwatch with a more affordable price, making it a great entry into the Apple Watch ecosystem.
features: Retina display with Force Touch
S5 chip for fast performance
Fall detection and Emergency SOS
Fitness and health tracking, including heart rate monitoring
Water-resistant design
Family Setup for managing multiple Apple Watches

name: Apple AirPods Max
description: The AirPods Max deliver high-fidelity audio with adaptive EQ and spatial audio, wrapped in a comfortable over-ear design.
features: High-fidelity audio with custom-built drivers
Adaptive EQ for rich and immersive sound
Active Noise Cancellation with Transparency mode
Spatial audio for a theater-like listening experience
Comfortable over-ear design with memory foam ear cushions
Digital Crown for easy control of playback and volume
Up to 20 hours of battery life on a single charge

specifications.audioTechnology: Custom-built drivers, Active Noise Cancellation, Spatial audio
specifications.battery: Up to 20 hours of battery life on a single charge
